title: Are Forgotten AD Service Accounts Leaving You at Risk?
summary: For many organizations, Active Directory (AD) service accounts are quiet afterthoughts, persisting in the background long after their original purpose has been forgotten. title: Hard-Coded 'b' Password in Sitecore XP Sparks Major RCE Risk in Enterprise Deployments
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed three security flaws in the popular Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) that could be chained to achieve pre-authenticated remote code execution.

title: Backups Are Under Attack: How to Protect Your Backups
summary: Ransomware has become a highly coordinated and pervasive threat, and traditional defenses are increasingly struggling to neutralize it. title: New Flodrix Botnet Variant Exploits Langflow AI Server RCE Bug to Launch DDoS Attacks
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have called attention to a new campaign that's actively exploiting a recently disclosed critical security flaw in Langflow to deliver the Flodrix botnet malware.

title: TP-Link Router Flaw CVE-2023-33538 Under Active Exploit, CISA Issues Immediate Alert
summary:
The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) on Monday added a high-severity security flaw in TP-Link wireless routers to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog, citing evidence of active exploitation.

title: Meta Starts Showing Ads on WhatsApp After 6-Year Delay From 2018 Announcement
summary:
Meta Platforms on Monday announced that it's bringing advertising to WhatsApp, but emphasized that the ads are "built with privacy in mind."
